stimulusHtml: Let f be the function given by f(x) = cos(2x). Write the first four nonzero terms and the general term of the Taylor series for f about x = 0 .

features.html:
The function g is continuous for all real numbers x and is defined by

g ( x ) = cos ( 2 x ) − 1 x 2   f o r   x ≠ 0.
